name: Office
long_description: The chartreuse carpet and wood paneling on the walls is a constant reminder that school is, indeed, cool.  The "tick, tock, tick, tock" from the clock on the wall provides the aural equivalent of Chinese water torture. In the middle of the room is a desk with a computer that looks a decade old.  An intercom microphone sits on a counter in the back. Next to it is a pixelated image of a mug of coffee taped to the wall, captioned, "I like school a latte." This motivational triumph more than restores your faith in the education system. Your instinct is to start vandalizing everything in sight, but then you notice something worth looking at- leaning against the far corner is an angel in a faux-leather jacket. Short spiky hair, dreamy- deer eyes, spikes, glitter nail-polish, and a mischievous smile that makes you wanna fall to your knees and pledge your miserable existence to the worship of this extreme hottie.
short_description: A boring office with a medieval computer and an even more ancient intercom. Oh and a completely wonderful otherworldly being, that too.
